Challenge of Blades.name: Challenge of Blades
Challenge of Blades.flavor: You plunge into the fray with a strike at the legs of one foe, then shift and make a second strike at another foe.
Challenge of Blades.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom vs. AC
Challenge of Blades.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed and marked by you until the end of your next turn.
Challenge of Blades.effect: You shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Challenge of Blades.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Challenge of Blades.secondaryAttack: Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom vs. AC
Challenge of Blades.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed and marked by you until the end of your next turn.

Made of Iron.name: Made of Iron
Made of Iron.flavor: You shrug off attacks; pain only makes you stronger.
Made of Iron.effect: You can assume the iron body stance. Until this stance ends, you have resist 5 to all damage.
Made of Iron.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom vs. AC
Made of Iron.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage, and you mark the target until the stance ends.

Sudden Strength.name: Sudden Strength
Sudden Strength.flavor: You exert all the power of your mighty frame.
keywords: Personal   Special: You can use this power only on your turn.  Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to Strength checks and Athletics checks, and your successful attacks also push the target 1 square.
Sudden Strength.special: You can use this power only on your turn.
Sudden Strength.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to Strength checks and Athletics checks, and your successful attacks also push the target 1 square.
